---
title: "Import data from Github and explore it"
output:
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
  html_notebook: default
---

***Create the dataframe***
```{r}
path <- "../data/temixco.csv"
data_temixco <- readr::read_csv(path)
head(data_temixco, n=6)
```


***Summary of the data***
```{r}
summary(data_temixco)
```

## Pre-visualizing the data:
```{r}
skimr::skim(data_temixco)
```


## Plotting one variable
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = data_temixco, mapping = aes(x = time, y = To)) + geom_line()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data_temixco, mapping = aes(x = time, y = WS)) + geom_line()
```
